revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LANCOM |model=L-451 |ean=4044144617225 |price=539 |fcc_date=11/21/2012 |manuf_country=Germany |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=NKR-DNXAH1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=P1014E |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0C-SCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41J128M16HA-15E |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |serial=DIN |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb DNXA-H1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9390 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:A0:57 |oui_eth=00:A0:57 |default_ch= }} [http://www.lancom.eu/produkte/wireless-lan/indoor-access-points/lancom-l-451agn-wireless/vorteile/ Product page (DE)]
[http://www.lancom-systems.de/en/products/wireless-lan/indoor-access-points/lancom-l-451agn-wireless/ Product page (EN)] :[http://www.lancom-systems.de/download/LC-L-451/L-451agn_EN.pdf Datasheet (EN)] There is almost assuredly no FCC ID on the label of the device as this device is sold mainly in Germany. However, Wistron included images of this device (and the [[LANCOM L-452dual|L-452 dual]]) in the FCC filing for the DNXA-H1 wireless module. "LANCOM Systems" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The RAM chip appears to be a 0VD22 D9LGQ, which appears to be the [http://www.micron.com/parts/dram/ddr3-sdram/mt41j128m16ha-15e 2Gb MT41J128M16HA-15E].
The FCC label has a title of '''LANCOM L-451agn Wireless''' for the device.. and shows a MAC with a 00:A0:57 OUI ('''LANCOM'''). :The wireless modules labels are shown with MACs starting with 30:14:4A ('''Wistron NeWeb'''). {{WiFiCert|WFA16405|02/27/2013}}
